name: Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections By BoomDevs
author: BoomDevs

sections.description:
Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections brings the most wanted and only missing feature of Elementor to help user create unlimited inner sections.
The only plugin that allows to add unlimited inner sections in Elementor without any other bloat-add-ons.

Made with ❣️ By BoomDevs

If you really like this plugin please don’t forget to give us your rating. Thanks so much! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

🚀 Check out our Other Products 🚀

Here are some of our amazing plugins that you can use to boost your WordPress website:

📑 TOP Table Of Contents 📑: Confirms a well-crafted table of contents to engage readers and search engines. Easily organize your content and make it more accessible.

📱 WP Mobile Bottom Menu 📱: Streamline navigation for mobile users, making it easier for them to explore your website on their phones or tablets.

🤖 WP AI CoPilot 🤖: Create content like a pro with the best AI content writer plugin for WordPress. Let AI assist you in crafting engaging and high-quality articles effortlessly.

🎖️ Product Badge Manager For WooCommerce 🎖️: Boost sales by attracting customers with eye-catching promotional product badges. Encourage them to explore and make purchases with confidence.

👥 Tribute Testimonials – WordPress Testimonial Grid/Slider 👥: Build any grid or slider layout using the drag-and-drop Testimonial Builder. Showcase positive feedback from satisfied customers and build trust with your audience.

Privacy Policy

Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections By BoomDevs collects some telemetry data upon user’s confirmation. This helps us to troubleshoot problems faster & make product improvements.

BoomDevs does not gather any data by default. The tracking SDK only starts gathering basic telemetry data when a user allows it via the admin notice. We collect the data to ensure a great user experience for all our users.

BoomDevs tracking SDK DOES NOT IMMEDIATELY start gathering data, without confirmation from users in any case.

Learn more about how BoomDevs collects and uses this data.

Support

If you have any questions, please email us at (contact@boomdevs.com)
sections.installation:
It’s very easy and straight forward to install this plugin. But before installing Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections make sure you’ve installed and activated Elementor.

Automatic Installation

  1. Go to Plugins > Add New screen from your WordPress website dashboard.
  2. Search for Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections By BoomDevs.
  3. Install and activate the plugin, that’s it!

Manual Installation

  1. Download Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections.
  2. Extract the unlimited-elementor-inner-sections-by-boomdevs.zip file. You’ll get plugin files inside unlimited-elementor-inner-sections-by-boomdevs directory.
  3. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/unlimited-elementor-inner-sections-by-boomdevs directory.
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen form your WordPress website dashboard.

Usage

After activating Unlimited Elementor Inner Sections you’re just 2 clicks away to add nesting sections/columns.

  1. Open a page to edit in Elementor mode.
  2. Right-click on a column where you want to have a nested section/column.
  3. Click the Add Nested Section from the options menu.

That’s it! You should have a nested column right away. You can manage these columns like any other Elementor column. Add a new column, use column settings and anything Elementor offers with a column.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

Update: support for WordPress 6.3

1.0.2

Fix: compellability issues with MalCare Plugin

1.0.3

Update: support for WordPress 6.4

1.0.4

Fix: compellability issues with Elementor 3.18.3

1.0.5

  • Fix: Appsero SDK security issues.
sections.screenshots:
1. Multiple level nesting demo

  2. Option to add nesting section in the context menu

  3. Adding nested section animated demo
sections.reviews:
Works well !

By classikd on April 11, 2023

Thank you for this plugin, very helpful 👍

Does the Job but Tricky to Use

By scifigirl128 on June 29, 2022

Thought it didn't work at first because I still couldn't drag an inner section widget into an existing inner section, but it turns out you have to right click and see that there's a new option: "Add Nested Section." Would've been helpful to have an explanation, which is why I took a star off. Otherwise, does the job!

Good Job

By Luis Antonio (futuramx) on April 8, 2022

Works exactly as intended. Thanks! :)
